targets.query: SELECT last("NewDownstreamCurrRate") *1000 FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("sendrate") FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("sendrate") FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT last("NewUpstreamCurrRate") *1000 FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("crc_errors"), 10s) FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("crc_errors"), 10s) FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)

panels.description: Is There a Fritz!OS update available

targets.query: SELECT last("upgrade_available") FROM /^$measurement$/

panels.title: Update

targets.query: SELECT "linkuptime" FROM /^$measurement$/
SELECT last("receiverate")*8 AS "current", last("downstreammax") AS "max" FROM /^$measurement$/
SELECT last("sendrate")*8 AS "current", last("upstreammax") AS "max" FROM /^$measurement$/
SELECT "totalbytessent" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "totalbytesreceived" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT last("systemuptime") FROM /^$measurement$/
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("totalbytessent"))) FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval) tz(${timezone:singlequote})
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("totalbytesreceived"))) FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz(${timezone:singlequote})

SELECT "model" AS "Model", "serialnumber" AS "Serial", "softwareversion" AS "SW Version", "external_ip" AS "IP", "external_ipv6" AS "IPv6", "number_of_hosts" AS "Number of network hosts", "connection_status" AS "PPP Connection Status", "physicallinkstatus" AS "Link Status", "physicallinktype" AS "Link Type", "remote_pop" AS "Remote POP", "last_connection_error" AS "Last Connect Error" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter LIMIT 1

list.description: Measurement name for the fritzflux data
list.label: InfluxDB measurement
list.name: measurement
